author: Andrew Backhouse
title: SARS-CoV-2: Virus able to survive in 60C temperatures
description: SARS-CoV-2: Virus able to survive in 60C temperatures news.com.au
content:
The coronavirus can survive long exposures to high temperatures, a new peer-reviewed study published on Biorxiv has shown.Researchers had to bring the temperature to almost boiling point to kill the virus completely.
The finding could have implications for t… [+1841 chars]
